Title: Firms roll out ₦100 million consumer promo
Summary: Premier Cool, Nigeria’s leading antibacterial cooling bar soap, has launched a nationwide consumer promotion tagged ‘10K for 10K’, in partnership with PalmPay, a leading digital banking platform, to reward 10,000 Nigerians with a total of ₦100 million in cash prizes .

Title: Lagos gets N179b, oil states N424b from FAAC’s N6tr disbursement
Summary: Nigeria’s federation account recorded its highest quarterly disbursement in the third quarter of 2025 . Total allocations rising to N6 trillion, highlighting a sharp surge in shared revenues .

Title: Six million Lagosians living with hypertension, LASG reveals
Summary: Data from 2025 from the Lagos State Ministry of Health have shown that an estimated six million residents are living with hypertension . The majority of the residents are unaware of their condition .

Title: Fire: Lagos lost 133 lives, N19b property, recorded 1,685 incidents in 2025
Summary: Lagos lost 133 lives, N19.72 billion worth of property in 2025 . Lagos State Government recorded 1,685 incidents in 2025, including 133 deaths and N19b property .

Title: Power generation shrinks by 62% as plants operate below capacity
Summary: Nigeria’s power generation capacity remained significantly underutilised in December 2025 . Grid-connected plants operating at just 38 per cent availability . Power generation shrinks by 62% as plants operate below capacity .

Title: Police arrest Nigerian caregiver in Canada over alleged assaults on vulnerable adults
Summary: Oghenemaro Dave Ejerua, a Nigerian caregiver, arrested and charged with seven counts of assault, Toronto police have confirmed . The caregiver was working at an East Toronto group home for vulnerable adults .

Title: Trump warns of ‘very strong action’ if Iran hangs protesters
Summary: US President Donald Trump warns of unspecified "very strong action" if Iranian authorities go ahead with threatened hangings of some protesters . Tehran calls American warnings a "pretext for military intervention"

Title: AFCON 2025: Chelle set to tweak Super Eagles tactical formation against Morocco
Summary: Eric Chelle hints at tweaking his tactical setup ahead of AFCON 2025 semi-final against Morocco . The Super Eagles take on Morocco in the Africa Cup of Nations semi-finals on Wednesday .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, January 14, 2026
Summary: The Nigerian Naira maintained a steady but pressurised stance against the United States Dollar at the mid-week opening of the foreign exchange market .

Title: Residents flee Sokoto villages in droves, as Bello Turji issues new threat
Summary: Residents of communities in the eastern part of Sokoto State, especially Tidibale, have started fleeing in large numbers, following fresh threats and warnings issued by bandits’ kingpin, Bello Turji .
